properties.name: Great Wall of China
properties.description: Built between the 3rd century BC and the 17th century AD, the Great Wall is the world's largest military structure.

properties.name: Machu Picchu
properties.description: Built in the 15th century, Machu Picchu is the most significant tangible legacy of the Inca civilization.

properties.name: Great Barrier Reef
properties.description: The world's largest coral reef ecosystem, home to diverse marine life.

properties.name: Pyramids of Giza
properties.description: The only surviving wonder of the ancient world, built as royal tombs during the Old Kingdom period.

properties.name: Taj Mahal
properties.description: An ivory-white marble mausoleum commissioned in 1632 by the Mughal emperor Shah Jahan.
